definition: the sun sets in the west (idiom)

sentences.english: The tall Gothic windows glinted in the sinking sun.
sentences.chinese: 高大的哥特式窗户在夕阳的照耀下闪闪发光。

sentences.english: The glow of his smile competed successfully with the sunset and caught Dai-yu's attention.
sentences.chinese: 这微笑与夕阳相映成辉，吸引了黛玉的注意。

sentences.english: At sunset the sky became a kaleidoscope of colors.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西下时，天空的颜色千变万化。

sentences.english: The sun sets behind a parched tree in Mato Grosso, midwestern Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 巴西中西部的马托格罗索州，被烤干的树后的夕阳。

sentences.english: Abide with me fast falls the eventide;
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西沉，求主与我同住。

sentences.english: The sun was setting west, along with tears of someone at the edge of the world.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西下，泪洒红尘里，人断肠，在天涯。

sentences.english: Finally, he saw a lone sunset palm trees standing.
sentences.chinese: 终于，他看到了夕阳斜晖里孤零零站着的棕榈树。

sentences.english: When'll you return like the sun on the decline?
sentences.chinese: 但眼前的夕阳西下了，不知何时会再回来。

sentences.english: Some people thought that railway is a "sunset industry".
sentences.chinese: 有人认为，铁路已是“夕阳工业”了。

sentences.english: It open the more brilliant, like glow of the setting sun as Ambilight.
sentences.chinese: 它就开得越灿烂，如同朝霞夕阳一样流光溢彩。

sentences.english: The sun was setting. It was getting dark.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西下，天渐渐黑下来了。

sentences.english: The setting sun casts a warm glow over stream-filled valleys.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西下，在溪流潺潺的山谷上投下一缕温暖的光辉。

sentences.english: Late sun backlights mountains and fog in this dramatic scene.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳背光山和雾在这一戏剧性场面。

sentences.english: The ring-like sun connected both sides of thin cloud.
sentences.chinese: 戒指状的夕阳连起了两边的薄云。

sentences.english: No bird flies to the nest. With unfinished love, the setting sun sinks beyond the western mountain.
sentences.chinese: 没有一只鸟飞来，夕阳，揣着未了情，沉向西山。

sentences.english: The setting sun in dusk, rays and shoulders thrown in slightly fold.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳依着黄昏，霞光撒在肩头泛起的微微褶皱。

definition: the sun sets in the west (idiom)
variant of 餘暉|余晖[yu2 hui1]
night scene/the dim light of night
